jobDescription: ASRC Technical Services is currently seeking a Data Analyst in El Paso, TX to support our ongoing programs at the El Paso Intelligence Center. The position will require rotation of shifts which includes weekends and holidays.Key Role: - Respond to requests for information possibly using fragmented information to search databases.  - Conduct detailed comprehensive searches by identifying and using various source databases.  - Analyze, interpret, interrelate, and evaluate the retrieved information and deliver the relevant data to the requestor.  -Input, review, verify and maintain accurate data and documentation in all areas assigned and in accordance with established quality plans, policy and procedures.
